content.detailedDescription:
I don���t know if these are a first ��� ufo���s in the fog ��� but here they are, from may 28, 2009.  the first two shots are at 5:35 pm; the third is at 5:36 pm.  the location is portola dr. and o���shaughnessy/woodside on twin peaks in san francisco facing northeast.  oddly enough, all shots were taken through the windshield of my car, which is obvious only in the third pic (shows windshield tinting.)

i���ve tried my best to sharpen and contrast the photos so that the objects show up better.  (i only work on copies of the originals, which remain intact.)  it���s difficult to see all that���s going on in these photos ��� a lot more shows in the originals.  i have cropped details from these shots, but can only upload 3 here.

the story of how i even came to be taking pictures of fog, one unremarkable day during my weekday commute, is too long to tell here.  suffice to say that, since 2001, i have been somehow ���compelled by impulse��� to point my camera at various empty vistas ��� at all hours of the day and night ��� only to find the most amazing photos when i downloaded them to my computer.

that may sound bizarre ��� but i don���t really care what anyone else might think.  i have hundreds ��� yes, hundreds ��� of digital photos of nearly every kind of craft imaginable (and some far beyond imagining.)  i also have some astounding photos of various ���celestial phenomena��� that also defy explanation.  they also showed up only after i downloaded the photos.

it may not be obvious, but the objects in these photos were definitely not visible to my naked eye.  i wasn���t trying to take pictures of anything!  there was no sound ��� nor was i aware of anything unusual moving in the sky.

how did i feel when i downloaded the photos 2 days later and found these?  fascinated and, truly, not one bit surprised.
content.summary: Triangle shapes in the fog

content.detailedDescription:
I was closing up shop at a video store i was working at in the fall of 1997, and rather than to drive straight home i sometimes enjoyed taking the long way home in the country with the radio playing in my car. 

the night in question i was approximately a mile east of 1st street in altoona on adventureland drive which is out in the country near the old graveyard out in the country. as i was about to turn west to head back toward town on adventureland drive, i looked off to the right uphill past the one lane bridge to check for traffic and up the road to the east about 500 yards away (approx) i saw a rectangular shaped light in the shape of a door just hovering probably 150 feet off the ground. there was nothing else around it in the air, as i could see the stars next to this doorway. but what didn't make since is that i could see inside the doorway into what looked like a large room on the inside, but there didnt seem to be anything that size around the doorway as if it wasnt really there. there was light beaming out of the doorway reflecting off the field, and inside the doorway i could see a wall in the back with a beige countertop lining the backside of the wall. there was a cable hanging down from the doorway that was perfectly straight had occasional 90 degree bends leading horizontally where the cable would again be perfectly straight for a while, and then it would bent back toward the ground with another perfectly straight section which eventually led to a small circular shaped object on the ground that was shining bright white. the whole time i watched, the object appeared in perfect motionless. 

when i was watching, at first my mind was trying to make since out of what it was that i was seeing. but as a few seconds went by and i still could not make since of what i was looking at, and yet i understood that what i was seeing was actually there and indescribable, tears came to my eyes and extreme cold chills came over me, as i don't know what in the heck it was, and so i got out of there. and every time i have thought of it since then, i feel the same way. 

note the dates mentioned is approximate, as i dont remember the exact week, but im sure it was on a friday in october 2007.
content.summary: Hovering invisible craft with visible door with cable draped to the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a stay at home dad. we have a sliding glass door going to the deck facing north. i am always on the look out for planes and chemtrails and whatever else may be in the sky. my daughter and i also like to look at our flowers and birds and other wildlife. 

so monday about 11am i see what i at first thought was a flock of birds flying south towards our house. they got closer and i realized that they werent birds; they seemed to be 5 wide, narrow diamond shapes.  what really then got my attention was when they made 45 degree turns, all in tandem, with no sound whatsoever. 

they seemed to reflect sunlight when they were facing about southwest it seems. from that angle they appeared to be metallic without a doubt. when they "turned" in other directions they appeared more of a light brown, almost grey color. 

there were 4 diamond-shaped objects in the middle, all in a diamond shaped pattern. they remained in that formation the entire time. there was a 5th object that seemed to "orbit" the other 4, first one way then another.  as soon as i could get my camera they faded into the sun. there was never a sound.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 diamond-shaped objects (almost in a diamond formation) flying south with the 5th object circling the other 4.

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to first state that this is probably my 50th sighting in a month...For some unseen reason i am lucky enough to watch these events unfold in front of me...Perhaps its just my great view of the mountains and city of phoenix - or perhaps just that i give them the attention they want. 

my first sighting of this type of object was may 8th i saw one pulsing brightly over the city...But that is a different even may 9th the object was back...Ma 10th it was back the 11th it was back all the way through to the 17th...The skys where stormy and overcast for 2 days...I saw no ufos ...No brightly pulsing lights...May 17th 18th and 19th i thaught what i had filmed and doccumented for 10days was just stars in space...Outside our atmosphere...I had lost hope and felt depressed.
but then may 20th...There it was low over the city - the skys where still overcast and it was raining no stars where visible and this object was glowing like the fricken moon throwing off colors in a mist like aura around it. i told you this to somewhat bring you up to speed on whats happened since my may 9th report.

the other most signifigant and doccumented sighting happened not to long ago on may 25th 2am - 4am{could have been longer i fell asleep} at 2 am i observed a bright shining object on the eastern horizon it was low on the horizon and moving tremendously slowly. i watched it through my camera and binoculars and noticed it had no blinking lights ...And to me seemed like  an immensley bright star...I dismised it as being nothing...But subconsiouslly some part of me knew it was no star it was far to bright and it didnt register on my skymap program...I went about my bussines for about 45 minutes to an hour at 245 - 3 am i looked back at it what was before a bright yellow/white light was now the same exact object i had been filming for weeks...This made me pretty excited i grabed my camera to zoom in on it - sure enough it was just like the other objects bright colorful and pulsing red blue green i watched it for some time filming and after a few short minutes i noticed a bright red pulse - {the light itself probably doubled in size and turned solidly red} i zoomed in more intensly and watched somthing i had never seen before - unlike all the other times ive withnessed these colored flashes this pulse kept going!
i would see it pulse bright blue and then bright red i would count and every 15-20 secconds it would pulse blue than red...In that order ...Every time.... these lights have intelligent pattern...And i filmed it for 2 minutes...


but that isnt the amazing thing about my may 25th sighting. after filming for a while i noticed i only had about 10 minutes left to film...The object seemed like it was getting closer slowly and i wanted to save room.
in case i was lucky enough to have it pass right over me...I smoked a cigarrete and just watched it for a while...I felt myself conected to this light...I had been up all night the previous night and i was exausted but i could not sleep...Not while this lights in the sky...I felted tied to it for as long as i could see it . after about an hour of smoking cigarettes and wondering what this light was i decided to zoom back in on it { it seemed to be getting closer } what i saw when i filmed this object took my breath away...Well not really it made me gasp and say oh my god...In a good way...When i zoom in to about 20x optical zoom it appear as not a solid sphere of light but a broken sphere the top 1/3 of the object was not glowing it was solid...The bottom orb was glowing immensely ...When i zoomed in to 30x or even further to 60x what i saw was amazing the top solid part of the orb vanished..The orb was still cut off,missing its top...But there was no longer a visible solid object - it just dimmed out of focus...The more amazing thing is what was going on in the bottom glowing orb i could clearly see in my viewfinder a glowing core of light with red and blue lines of light swimming around it ...It was amazing looking into it i felt the most overwhelming feeling of serene calmness , connectedness , spiritualness , i believe the reason it appeared as 3 different objects at 3 different times was because its
lights appearance changes deppending on the distance... i had observed 2 of this lights stages before just not in one instance...The latest stage when the object seemed its brightest and biggest was at about 3 - 4 am.

here is my exact log entry
(i keep a journal to doccument these events)


    "may 25th,2009 aprox. 2am yellow orb observed and filmed .
     on eastern horizon - noticed pulsating light on western horizon
     same as previous ufos.Noted siris's speed relative to western ufo"
     {siris is a major star constilation}
     "aprox. 2 30am yellow orb began to pulse 
    similiar to the other ufos and for the first time
    i filmed 20+ red and blue pulses and with intelligent pattern
    there would be a blue and then a red pulse every 15-20secconds
      this object is amazing to me may25th a day i will never forget"
      "aprox 3-4am - the object now appears as the 2 toned upside down
      saucer with an orb coming out the bottom side, the bottom orb has
     a bright glowing core with red blue lights dancing around it.
     filmed object in all 3 stages and or distances went from yellow orb
    to pulsating orb to 2toned laser show like orb"
   also noted after rewatching my footage there is a moment right before i adjust my cameras view, immediatly after i had been thinking god i wish i could communicate {thaughts along those lines} well right after those thaughts right before i adjust my camera there is an unexplainable noise i did not hear it with my ears it is a quiet sound but my camera does not capture sound very well...It wouldnt hear anything i cant, it barely picks up my voice from 1 foot away this noise is earie and otherworldly to say the least im including a short clip of my footage...The same clip i posted on the internet ...There is only one point where my footage is edited i used my camera software to sharpen the image and turned contrast down to eliminate glare - now those settings would not create any kind of illusion i editted it in such a way because the lines of light are to fine to appear on a computer screen {thats what i think at least} 
you will see in my footage this object is real and i edited it so that you could see what my eyes saw from the luxery of your own home...The noise is in this clip twords the end i suggest getting really close to your speakers or turning the volume up it is a faint noise...I hope dominique gets to read and see this i talked to him about it briefly on the phone plz assign this report to him or somthing =}...
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Oval,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Changing light south of usery mountain range 25th of may 2009--filmed.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen several reports on this already. just thought i'd add my 2 cents...
object was traveling appox north to south.
object was extremely bright. to bright for a sattelite and seemed to generate it's own source of light.
object was at approx 75-95k feet altitude.
object was moving extremely fast. faster than any plane or sattelite i have observed.
there was no sound coming from the object.
object just vanished.
content.summary: Star object traveres night sky....

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a orange flashing light at about 3:30 (stone sober) and i figured it was a florida power and light truck. it did an abrupt turn around and at that point i took notice because i figured there was a utility problem.

i got up to check out what was going on and the flashing lights were now hovering 30 plus feet off the ground about a hundred yards from me. i watched the lights and object for a couple of minutes and i figured i would either wake my wife or get a video camera. i wasn't scared but just in awe and intrigued.

i ran over and shouted to my wife to wake up and it took about 45 seconds to get her back to the spot i was standing.

the object had moved another one hundred yards or more across the lake to partially obscured area. my wife and i could see some of the bright orange lights thru the trees still moving about but our line of vision was obscured at that point.

i walked into the bedroom to go to sleep after five minutes and noticed it was 3:30 am.
content.summary: Orange flashing lights, one large and one small. no noise, and hovered.

content.detailedDescription:
(in spanish) 
me encontraba en el salon de clases y justo cuando sali a mi receso observe esta imagen en el orisonte, por el hecho de ser la frontera y el aeropuerto a espaldas de la universidad, pense que podria ser un avion o un helicoptero de migracion, pero el objeto duro mucho en el mismo sitio (sobre el final de la pista de aeropuerto) sobrevolando estatico y era muy luminoso, entonces decidi tomar la fotografia y en la fotografia sale con mas detalle que a simplevista ya que a simple vista tenia la forma de un solo objeto muy luminoso y poco triangular, pero en la fotografia paresen dos objetos caasi triangulares y acercandolos no tiene ninguna forma de avion o helicoptero, trate de hacer una segunda toma y cuando la tome pocos segundos despues ya no estaba el objeto desaparecio increiblemente rapido. le adjunto las dos fotografias del lugar que muestran la primera al objeto y la segunda unos segundos despues que ya no estaba.
content.summary: Ovni sobre aeropuerto tj.

content.detailedDescription:
During the summer of 1955 i was at a drive-in movie located on bluffton road in ft. wayne, in.  i turned 9 years old in august and my brother turned 11 in july of that year.  i don't know what month of that summer the sighting took place.  my brother and i were in the back seat and my step-father was in the driver's seat with my mother beside him.

my step-dad noticed 4 large discs in the distance, heading our way.  they were yellow/orange in color and glowed as if lit from within.  the discs approached from our left front, continued almost directly overhead, and disappeared into the distance behind our right rear.  as they neared our loation, we all exited the car and watched them pass overhead.  they were moving slowly and skittered about erratically, though staying in a rough formation and moving along a straight route.  they made no sound.  they were headed toward the general direction of ft. wayne's airport, baer field.  everyone at the movie was standing outside their cars watching.

when they were overhead, they appeared to be no more than 200 feet above us, and perhaps 100 feet in diameter, although it was impossible to really know one measurement without knowing the other.  they were about the size of a basketball held at arm's length.  they were symetrically shaped, thin at the circumference, tapering more thickly toward the middle, slightly rounded at the top and bottom points.  i could see a line along the circumference, as if the tops and bottoms had been two pieces joined together.  also, there were dark lines forming radii from the edges of the rounded bottom points and extending nearly to the outer edges.  between each radial pair of lines, there was a dark square, almost like port windows.  the dark lines and squares were indistinct, but clearly visible.  the next morning the journal gazette reported the speed and direction of the objects as they passed over the city as determined by call-ins to the night editor's desk during the sighting.
content.summary: 4 amber-colored discs flew over our auto during an outdoor movie.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home form phoenix heading south i witnessed what appeared to be military flares directly ahead of me however to the west above estrella mountain were two bright amber lights that were not moving at all. i know what flares look like but these would be a constant brightness for several minutes then they would blink out but come back in the same exact spot. i have seen these before, even low in the sky above the town where there are no military exercises. they just appear at random in the same spot usually and stay hovering for hours. this time one dimmed out and came back then several minutes later they both were gone. someone should definitely camp and post up somewhere over in the estrella range because no doubt they will be back again.
content.summary: Two amber lights above estrella mountain...Hovering and then fading in and out.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at around 10:30 pm cst, i was in my back yard situating things in preparation for the anticipated storms on 6/2. while gathering toys, i took note of a lone star in the ne sky. a few moments later, i noticed 2 "stars" in that same area, but quickly realized the second star was bigger, brighter and moving. it was moving at about the same rate of a commercial plane, but there were no beacon lights and it was traveling on a course not often traveled by aircraft. out here, most commercial aircraft travel east/west or west/east, but almost never north/south as this was. 

this craft appeared to be heading south or south east. what was strange, the large ���orb like��� light slowly dissipated and then two very faint lights were visible - one appeared to be red the other blue. this was not an aircraft turning off the landing lights, as they didn't quickly fade out. this was a process were the light slowly reduced in size over about 3-5 seconds. once the "main" light was out, i was able to track the object across the sky for a few more moments, but it was very hard to see it continuously. every few seconds i could pick back up on the movement a little further south in the sky. i ran to get my camera and when i returned i was unable to pick up the movement anywhere. not sure what it was, but it really didn���t look like a commercial aircraft for many reasons.  just thought i'd share. thanks!!
content.summary: Strange bright orb like light that slowly dissipated into small dim lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I got out of my car at my mom's house, and walked up to her door...And noticed an object in the distance...See, venus is very bright, and i thought this was venus for a second, then noticed it was moving.I waited to hear the helicopter sounds, ( we have a local airport that does some kind of helicopter repair)...But there was none, and no flashing lights anywhere.

this thing was moving towards the moon from the northwest in a southeast direction...When it got to about the point in the sky where the moon was, it made a kind of arc, then  traveled back down that same line...And continued on to the southeast.

i then noticed it get duller and duller, like it either "phased out", or kept going straight through the atmosphere.



 at 5:00 this morning(june 2, 2009), my wife heard a low hum with a kind of pulsing in it, that lasted for about a minute.She saw nothing, as it had her scared out of her wits.
content.summary: Non-flashing bright light moving silently across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the robinson mall in pittsburgh,pa which is only a few miles down the road from pittsburgh internationl airport. i was going back to my car and i look up into the sky and see a giant fireball like orb/sphere staying stationary so i'm assuming its a star or planet or some kind. i keep watching and a few minutes after staying stationary it moves rapidly to another part of the sky and changes to green like color before cloaking or going invisible or altogether vanishing deep into the space.

there was other activity going on in the sky as jetliners were coming in to land at pittsburgh internationl airport so it was a nice image for depth seeing this huge jet with landing lights and flashing lights coming lower to the ground as the burning star stayed beneath the dark clouds until moving rapidly.
content.summary: Flaming orb like sphere stood stationary before shapeshifting and jolting across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this because a similar light was reported by a mufon dispatcher.

this was reported to (denise) mufon dispater on saturday evening at 11:30pm on may 30th 2009. 

i saw a light in the north west sky a while after sundown.  i saw it thursday night but didn't think it was a big deal because i saw it just before it seemed to move below the treeline.  i thought it was just a star that seemed to blink in the twilight.

the next night, friday, i went outside with my wife and daughter to look at saturn and saw this "star" again.  i took a closer look this time and noticed it looked like it was blinking different colors.  after we looked at saturn, i pointed my telescope at the "star" and verified it did look as if it was blinking red, blue, yellow, orange, white, and green.  i didn't notice if it was moving any faster than the other stars in the sky because it moved under the treeline and out of my sight.  i think the time was approx 9:45-10:00pm.  

i tried to get a look at it saturday night but the sky was cloudy.

i have not seen the light again but i will continue to look in that direction to see if it appears again.  the nearest major airport to my home is in pittsburgh but it is about 100miles due north.  the mufon report from saturday, may 30 was in the il area which is in the direction the light would have been from my location in wv.  i'm not sure but i am wondering if we saw the same light.
content.summary: Bright object flashing different colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: san francisco, ca
time: 21:21 pst
visibility: clear, >10 miles
cloud cover: none
sky: dark
stars visible: yes

i went out on the back deck of my home for a cigarette and i always spend some time looking straight up at the stars. after a minute or so and out the peripheral vision of my right eye, i noticed a fast moving star like object. object was very similar in size to the background stars (only slightly bigger) but moving in a straight line sw to ne. object was brighter than the stars of the big dipper, but not as bright as the brightest star in the sky at the time. altitude (i would guess) approximately 40-60,000 ft. +. object crossed approx 12 inches of sky (from my standing viewpoint at arms length)in about 10 seconds. i turned and took my eyes off the object as i thought about running in to get my video camera. i then realized that the object would be gone before i made it back, but by the time i looked back up the object had disappeared. no engine sounds were heard.

this was a fast mover. it wasn't a meteor or a shooting star as the object was much too slow for either. i was pretty perplexed by what i had seen. i tried a time / distance exercise on a high flying (30-35,000 ft) 747 the next day and that took approximately 50+ seconds to cross the same amount of sky. a 747 flies at approx 525-550 kts. i guesstimate that this would make the unknown object's speed somewhere around 2,700 kts.

i have a commercial pilot's license and can pretty much name any aircraft - civil or military - under the sun. this didn't look like a known a/c to me (it was spherical / star). not wanting to speculate too much, but it quite possibly could have been a black project a/c (hypersonic). i have seen one "doughnuts on a rope" contrail before (again viewed at night from the same spot and headed in almost the same direction about 1 year ago). the residual contrail was only visible due to an extremely bright full moon - but i had heard of these over california before. the black project a/c theory my be part of the reason for my 5 day hesitation in posting. 

whatever it was - it was fast and definitely unidentified.

would be interested to hear if there were any other reports around the same time.
content.summary: Fast moving "star" like object

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on interstate 10 around 6.50pm(local time), seen object hovering in the distance ( southern sky )observed object until the sun went behind the horizon and lost sight. object did not move for the time i observed it. also witnessed by passenger. i did take  pictures of the object. found it strange the object had no lights, showed no source of anything powering it. it did not move from the time i witnessed it.
it was near las cruces, nm where there is a miltiary base and a military uav test sight.
content.summary: Seen in the distance hovering over mountain as the sun was setting.

content.detailedDescription: I take this picture while chemtrail watching
content.summary: I make this picture while chemtrail watching.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out my back door to smoke a cigarette. it was a clear sky. i looked up and saw what looked like a moving star.Was too bright and too close to be a satellite of any kind. it made no sound. it had no flashing aircraft lights. it was moving east southeast in a zig zag flight path. it was moving away from me. so to assume that it was a headlight on an aircraft would mean the aircraft was flying backwards which is ridiculous.
eventually my view was blocked somewhat by tree tops but i continued to observe as it came to a slow stop. i walked north a few feet to get a clearer view and it started to move again in the same direction toward the east coast until my view was completely blocked and it was gone. i do not own a camera, so i couldn't capture whatever it was.
content.summary: Bright star moving within atmosphere, zig- zag flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
Time - 22:00 exactly

its a hot summers evening, still light amidst the recent weekends heatwave. im sat by my computer typing this exactly as it happens. 
as i sit here in my studio on the mufon website, i look out of my window to see a extremely bright light over a nearby hill visible between the houses of the cul-de-sac. 

when i first see the light i automatically think of the reasonably and rational things it could be, a flare, a plane. after the light hovered, moved slightly to the left, then faded away i put it down to being an aircraft. this was about 9:50 when the first sighting occured. in the 10 minutes i have been away from the computer since i began typing this, i dont know if it has returned however all i know is when i got back i looked and the light was there once more, glowing bright and fading within a 20 second timespan.

if it werent for the second encounter of this unknown phenomeneon i would not be typing this now, however i have scanned this website and the detail matches similar case of floating lights also spotted in sheffield however slightly further away from my current destination.

note>< the light has just returned as i am typing this, exactly the same, appearing and fading. 

as i was saying it matches the description of someone elses sheffield sighting in which a series of floating lights hovered and flew over theri house. i dont know if these lights will return. however i have an exam in the morning and i need sleep.  

to finish. everytime i saw the floating light i felt a strange awe and aura, almost as if time had stopped for a breif second note
another sighting, howevber this time one floated sidewards and another came into visibility. this is creepy now. i will post another file if this sighting contunues tomorow. i cant take a photo. my phone wont pick up the light as it is too far away. however i wouldnt have typed all this if i had seen nothing. end.
content.summary: Repeated appearance and dissapearance of floating flashing object.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom i live on the beach in a condo i saw this very bright bright lite coming from the west and i opened the window to get a better look with my banocqulers and i did not see any blinking lites that a plane has and i than ran to my balcany on the sea side of the condo an watch it till it got to the harizin then it took off in a second 3peaple coming off the beach also saw it an made a comment that if we report this they will tell us that it was a weather balloon. i know that it was not aplane or anything i've ever seen before, and i was a scout sniper in the us marine corps an i know what planes an helicoptors look like an this was nothing i've ever seen
content.summary: Very bright lite brighter than any light i ever seen i was in my bedroom  i look out my window  an saw it

content.detailedDescription: A saucer-shapped ufo just arrived, hovered for a moment and departed at full speed.
content.summary: Silver flying saucer.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the kitchen to get a drink of water about 1:00 a. m  when i noticed a bright light through my window toward the east.  i thought it was an airplane or helicopter at first, but realized that it was not anything like that after watching it for a while.
i decided to look at it through my binoculars.  it looked like streaks of light.  i tried my video camera, but could not get a picture.  finally i used my digital flash camera and was able to get some pictures.

it appeared to be a round ball of light far away.  when i zoomed with my camera as far as i could, i could see two distinct separate objects which looked like round or cylindrical shapes with a liquid substance coming down from one of them.  they appeared to have ridges on one side and feet, maybe to land on.  they looked like shiny metal.  they moved together appearing to be one at a distance as though they were connected in some way.

i was afraid that it would see me with my flashing light on my camera.  it did move closer to my house and at one point was straight up over my house, but still at a distance.  when i stopped taking pictures, it moved further away looking smaller and smaller as it went up higher.

i was too tired by 5:00 a. m. and had to go back to bed, but it was still there.  i was a little frightened and my cat was agitated and crying most of the night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw one bright light in the sky which did not appear to move but hovered for hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufos here everynight too. last night this bright flash came out of nowhere in the backyard on the house. laye on my back on the tanning chair in the middle of the night one fly by and turn off its lights right when it hit the tree to the left, this happens everynight. then another flashed its lights. sometimes i wonder if they are humans like jesus or something or they are aliens. all i think about now is jesus and mary. i dont know why they are here everynight or what they want but activity is slowly increasing and my mom and dad dont believe me and act afraid of me when i am so afraid to even go out in public or talk to anyone. last night was like my 200th ufo sighting in 4 years.

much love and respect
content.summary: Hey lousiana

content.detailedDescription: It was like in the day time when you see the moon in the middle of the day but this looked like the big dipper stars.  at first i thougth i have never seen stars in the day light how neat but looked closer and the stars started moving to each other and in different formations and started moving away slowly.  i also saw planes flying but looked much closer and moved let a plane with fog tail but the star looking things had no tail just let a star.  it was different than i have aver seen before maybe satellites?  it was neat to see and just want to report if at all anything at all?  thanks phil grimes 1 (706) 283-4052. i have no pictures all i have is a camera cell phone and this would not have worked i would need a good lens camera to get good photo.
content.summary: In the daytime about 4 p.M. at first looked like the big dipper (stars).

content.detailedDescription: This was reported to (denise) mufon dispater on saturday evening at 11:30pm on may 30th 2009.
content.summary: Ufo by midway airport

content.detailedDescription: Ufos are here and real. craft flying over houses 175 feet above ground cloaked as bombers. fly overhead and you can tell by their light flouresence and blinking in different areas of the supposed craft that this is not a true craft. hologram perhaps? wow!
content.summary: Ufos here every night!! unbelievable! lights exploding separating.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in front on a laundromat (between gold st and union place) on a retainer wall, waiting for my cousin to finish doing his laundry.  i was looking out over the hudson towards the palisades when i noticed a very bright object hovering in the sky over the hudson river between yonkers train station and glenwood train station.  the object was cylinder in shape with well defined edges, appeared "solid", and had an extremely shiny surface (like mylar).  it was rotating clockwise at approximately 6-8 seconds per revolution, was tilted at approximately a 45 degree angle, and was at a height slightly above that of small planes and helicopters usually seen flying over the area.  from my perspective, the object measured about 3/4" to 1" in length and about 1 centimeter in width.  the object hovered at first then slowly moved in a zig-zag fashion (rotating slowly as it went) first moving southeast, then moving west - climbing as it went.  i did not see any windows, fins, wings, tethers or anything else attached to it.  it did not behave like a balloon and i could not hear any noise associated with it nor see any exhaust.  i did not notice any planes or other aircraft in the area at the time.  the sky was clear and the day very sunny.  my initial reaction was confusion at seeing a "tube" in the sky then bewilderment and amazement as i watched it for close to 15 minutes until it faded from view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright metallic cylinder observed hovering (in controlled fashion) over hudson river in lower westchester.

content.detailedDescription:
Going to work at 5:10am i saw a bright light in the sky. i don't normally see any star or planet at this location. i took out the binoculars and could see this was not a star but a roundish object. i quickly took out my nikon s630 digital camera and took several photos. 
the object was either stationary or slow moving as i could not detect any movement. this object was brighter than any other star or planet in the sky. 
i was surprised to see it appear as a red color on the top of the object in the photograph.
content.summary: Very bright object in sky, was not a star or planet; [cms/tg/pid]

content.detailedDescription: After an evening at a friens house i exited the front door and looked to my north and noticed a bright very star and looked back again and noticed it moving from north to south. asked my friend to come to his front yard and observe it. (he is ex military) the light at about my 10 oclock we noticed a smaller light moving much faster and blinking in a slow (3 sec interval) caught up with the larger ball if light and passed it. the smaller blinking  light duration was about 40 sec. the larger light at the end of th event slowly got smaller and went out. from the first sight too end of event was about a min.
content.summary: Bigger than a star, ball of light ,+ a faster blinking light, below.

content.detailedDescription:
a friend came back from doing my clothes at a laundromat at about 3:30 pm and when i opened the door for her she said come out and look at this. so i hobbled out onto the porch on my walker and looked up to where she was pointing and i see a sliver of a metallic object. it had a red/orange glow near the center that went on and off and a bright white light that went on and off.  i was thinking that maybe the white light was a reflection of the sun. i don't know. it seemed still for about 5 minutes and then started drifting.  it was out of my sight within about 2 minutes.  the friend and my neighbor watched it for another maybe 3 minutes until they lost track of it behind the houses.  i was seated, they were standing and had a better view.  one thing unusual is that when i first spotted it there were 2 very small clouds near it, otherwise the skies were perfectly blue.
 my first impression of the object was that i was looking at a disc shaped ufo that was turned so that i only saw the side. i am not sure, it could have been a cylinder. it was very exciting for me to see it and i tried to vector it closer.  i sent it telepathic messages and even spoke out loud to it, inviting it to come closer.
content.summary: I saw my first ufo over new orleans this afternoon.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i (son was sleeping in car seat) were driving on i-275 south(east) towards milford, ohio, a suburb of cincinnati.  as i was driving south i looked up in the sky and a couple of miles ahead of me i saw a glowing orange sphere. i knew it was not a meteorite because i was driving for a good minute before i drove underneath it (and it was still hovering).  i kept yelling to my wife in the back with the baby to look up and see it.  she could not see it from her angle.  i did not want to be the only person who saw this because the veracity of a sole witness is always a challenge. as we drove underneath the object i made the decision to turn on my hazards and hop on the shoulder.  i have never pulled over for something like this before, as i have always been able to identify an object, until now.  as i was slowing down i kept trying to look up and i almost hit the guardrail as i was pulling over.  my wife yelled me to watch out.  this did not make her happy since it was her car.  as i stopped the car i opened the sunroof and said look!  there it was just hovering above us.  an orange glowing sphere.  the time was 9:39pmest.  it was difficult to determine its altitude and relative size.  she thinks it was ���too high for a helicopter���, but i think it was only about 5000'-10,000���.  it was the size of a (small) dime.  of course you need to know the altitude to determine its actual size.  it did not have any other colored lights on it.  just an orange glowing "sphere".  i should caution in calling it a sphere as we were unable to determine if it was disc/egg shaped due to the glowing light.  sphere matches the best visual description.  the light did change in intensity but it was a very small fluctuation and could have been our eyes playing tricks on us.  my wife and i were going through a detailed q&a trying to discern what it was.  it was not moving, on any plane (x,y, or z). there were no conventional nav lights or beacons, there was no noise except for the highway, and my wife complaining to get us out of there because i woke my son up and they did not share the same enthusiasm and excitement.  i did not want to leave because i wanted to wait and see it move.  i wanted to see its propulsion.  was it conventional or something unexplainable by our current understanding of technology?  this would have filled in a great piece of the puzzle and possibly answered the question.  very frustrated, i decided to heed the wife���s advice and get off the shoulder because we were not in a safe place on the road with traffic whizzing by us.

after safely merging back on i-275, i immediately called my mother's house to tell them to run out front and look to the north a few miles and up (they are on the highest development around and would have a perfect view).  my stepfather answered my call and ran to the front to take a look.  he saw nothing.  we reached exit 59 within a minute (milford parkway) and looked to our right (north).  you could see a great amount of the horizon and we saw nothing.  we arrived home about 5 minutes later, then i made calls to friends and family and now i���m typing this report.

the credibility of the witnesses (my wife and i) are impeccable, as well as the intelligence and scientific backgrounds to make an unbiased observation.  we are also well known and respected in the community.  in addition i am an amateur astronomer and private pilot (not current) with exceptional knowledge of all active military aircraft in service (except of course current black projects).  if it warrants an investigation, you have all of my contact information and can google and contact me.  thank you.
content.summary: Wife and i pulled off i-275 (on shoulder) to watch orange glowing sphere hover for 2 minutes. please see detailed description.
